localTransport.details: Use the Mumbai local train for affordable and efficient travel. Taxis and auto-rickshaws are readily available.

accommodation.address: Apollo Bunder, Colaba, Mumbai, Maharashtra 400001, India

activities.title: Lunch at Britannia & Co.
activities.description: Enjoy a Parsi meal at the iconic Britannia & Co. restaurant known for its berry pulao and Irani cuisine.

activities.title: Visit Chhatrapati Shivaji Maharaj Terminus (CST)
activities.description: Explore the historical Chhatrapati Shivaji Maharaj Terminus (CST), a UNESCO World Heritage Site and a masterpiece of Victorian Gothic architecture.

sustainableAlternative.title: Walking Tour of CST Area
sustainableAlternative.description: Join a guided walking tour to learn about the history and architecture of CST and surrounding heritage buildings.
sustainableAlternative.ecoImpact: Reduces carbon footprint compared to motorized transport and supports local guides.

activities.title: Gateway of India & Marine Drive
activities.description: Visit the iconic Gateway of India and take a stroll along Marine Drive, also known as the Queen's Necklace, enjoying the sunset.
activities.location: Gateway of India & Marine Drive, Mumbai

activities.title: Dinner at Leopold Cafe
activities.description: Have dinner at Leopold Cafe, a historic restaurant that has been serving patrons since 1871.

sustainableAlternative.title: Explore Street food
sustainableAlternative.description: Eating at local vendors reduces resources and supports the community
sustainableAlternative.ecoImpact: Reduces waste from commercial establishments and supports local economy

activities.title: Visit Elephanta Caves
activities.description: Take a ferry to Elephanta Island and explore the ancient cave temples dedicated to Lord Shiva, a UNESCO World Heritage Site.

sustainableAlternative.title: Visit Kanheri Caves
sustainableAlternative.description: Avoid boating, visit a location on land. Explore the Kanheri Caves.

activities.title: Lunch at Cafe Military
activities.description: Relish non-vegetarian delicacies at Cafe Military, a popular restaurant known for its flavorful dishes.

activities.title: Visit Mani Bhavan Gandhi Museum
activities.description: Learn about the life and work of Mahatma Gandhi at Mani Bhavan Gandhi Museum, a former residence of Gandhi during his visits to Mumbai.
activities.location: Mani Bhavan Gandhi Museum, Gamdevi, Mumbai

activities.title: Shopping at Colaba Causeway
activities.description: Explore the vibrant Colaba Causeway market and shop for souvenirs, clothing, and handicrafts.

sustainableAlternative.title: Support local artisans
sustainableAlternative.description: Instead of shopping look for organizations that directly help the artisans
